DOC.brief_summary: This randomize clinical trial examine difference post-dates induction ( induction 40 week pregnancy ) begin morning compare even first-time mother . Sleep fatigue measure measure see differ time induction . Other measure include rate birth within 24 hour admission , length labor , use labor analgesic , method delivery .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Sleep , Fatigue , Timing Post-dates Inductions Among Nulliparas
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized clinical trial first-time pregnant woman require post-dates induction ( induction 40 week gestation ) . Women randomize labor induction time morning evening . On hospital admission woman sign study consent , complete sleep questionnaire fatigue assessment . Fatigue sleep time assessment subsequently do study subject every 4 hour woman enter active labor . At onset active labor , assessment stop . Labor outcomes patient satisfaction obtain woman deliver .
